reasoning: FSGS collapsing variant is a specific histological subtype, representing approximately 10-15% of FSGS cases. Global FSGS prevalence estimated at ~5-8 per 100k; collapsing variant prevalence estimated at 0.8 per 100k. Measured as prevalence (chronic kidney disease). Data from nephrology registries and renal biopsy studies.
source: Global Burden of Disease Study (kidney disease component)
